text: Need Justin Mitchell for Autobarn campaign. Budget around $15,710, looking for 1 x 90-second product demo, 3 x Facebook post, 2 x Twitter post, 1 x 90-second product demo, 2 x Behind-the-scenes content. 6 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs September 2025. Usage rights for 7 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
